divs: Sighting DetailsIts a hobby of mine to record and review video taken with a webcam from on top of my roof. I've been doing this for over a year now and have never captured anything even close to this before. You might not be able to tell but the object moved across the skyline in less than a second. The camera itself captures 30 frames a second. I really dont think its a bird.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Massapequa
There were no other sightings in Massapequa on or around April 27th 2013
Summary: reviewed my weather cam and found this.
